topic_or_construct: Relationship quality with parents and friends
measured_by: modified Inventory of Parent and Peer Attachment (IPPA)
justification: "Participants completed a slightly modified version of the Inventory of Parent and Peer Attachment (IPPA)... The measure is frequently used to assess subjective relationship quality in adolescent and young adult populations."
"We used a modified version of the 'hot' Columbia Card Task (CCT) to assess other-oriented decision making preferences under conditions of risk."

topic_or_construct: Other-oriented social decision-making in probabilistic learning
justification: "In order to assess other-oriented preferences in probabilistic learning, we employed the Social Gambling Task (SGT)."
"To assess self-other similarity judgments between participants and their parents and friends, respectively, we utilized the lexical trait-judgment (LTJT) task."
"We collected the Brief Sensation Seeking Scale (BSSS-8)... participants rated the extent to which they agreed with a series of eight items describing sensation-seeking behaviors."

measured_by: Domain Specific Risk-Taking Scale (DOSPERT) – Health and Social subscales
justification: "We administered the Domain Specific Risk-Taking scale (DOSPERT)… Participants rated the likelihood of engaging in 15 different health and social risk behaviors."
"Participants were administered the Perceived Stress Scale, which measures how often individuals… experienced stress-related behaviors over the previous month."
"The traditional Emotion Regulation Questionnaire (ERQ) was administered. The ERQ taps the behavioral suppression and cognitive reappraisal strategies."
"We administered a version of the Emotion Regulation Questionnaire edited to address one's ability to effectively use cognitive reappraisal."
